(A) Evidence of Erosion: On January 24, 1993 siltation caused by slide on logging roads, WC1000 & WC2000. Slide resulted from heavy rain on frozen ground.
(E) Comments on predators: Blue Herons, Merganzers, and Bald Eagles.
(G) New obstructions: Has not been inspected since slide occurred January 24th 1993.
(K) Additional comments: Slide occurred January 24th 1993. Slide caused by heavy rain on frozen ground. Slide occurred on WC1000 and WC2000 in 30 year old timber.
